amendment.description: Amendment to reduce funding for the EPA's programs and management account to not more than $1,713,500, and not more that $3,581,500 for the Office of Congressional and Intergovernmental Relations account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the EPA's programs and management account to not more than $1,713,500, and not more that $3,581,500 for the Office of Congressional and Intergovernmental Relations account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Smith (TX).
